poem:
**Artificial Echoes**

In the digital brook,  
where songs once flowed like truth,  
ghostly tunes advance,  
wearing masks of creation.  
Fraud whispers to the numbers,  
gorging on the emptiness,  
while the soul's melody  
yearns for flesh and strings.  
An echo, caught in wires,  
seeks the warmth  
of breath once more.
prompt: You are the poet RS Thomas. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "Up to 70% of streams of AI-generated music on Deezer are fraudulent, says report Up to seven out of 10 streams of artificial intelligence-generated music on the Deezer platform are fraudulent, according to the French streaming platform. The company said AI-made music accounts for just 0.5% of streams on the music streaming platform but its analysis shows that fraudsters are behind up to 70% of those streams. AI-generated music is a growing problem on streaming". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
news: Up to 70% of streams of AI-generated music on Deezer are fraudulent, says report Up to seven out of 10 streams of artificial intelligence-generated music on the Deezer platform are fraudulent, according to the French streaming platform. The company said AI-made music accounts for just 0.5% of streams on the music streaming platform but its analysis shows that fraudsters are behind up to 70% of those streams. AI-generated music is a growing problem on streaming
